Hero.Title: João Carias
Hero.Subtitle: I’m a Front-End developer with 14+ years of experience  on software development, with a love for solving problems!

page.Content:
# Welcome

I’m a professional front-end developer and, for most of my career, this has not been the case. The path I’ve taken has had many challenges and  all of them had some degree of impact in my journey to become a good developer and a mature professional. 
The purpose of this site is to let people know me, my professional career and personal interests.  

___
